title: My Account
body:
I currently have an account named JuiceBurg, and on my laptop I created an account named Chief Burg. Today I logged into LoL to find my account on my pc is Chief Burg which I never transferred and I don't know how to switch it back. I believe this is due to me using the same Microsoft account on both my pc and laptop. Also when I login in on the internet as I'm doing now the account is also Chief Burg. Please help.
Thank you.

replies.body: Ahhh it sounds like you might be a little confused about the different between your username and your Summoner name. Those are separate, you use your username to login and your Summoner name is what appears on friends lists and in-game. It looks like your Summoner name is Cheif Burg and the other name is your username.
Now he needs to change it because we all know. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
